mapper.select:
select pc.StgId,pc.TaskId, pc.StirId,bi.BuilderName,ei.EPPName,tp.Placing,sum(pc.PanNum) as qty, sum(pc.MatV1) as MatV1,sum(pc.MatV2) as MatV2,sum(pc.MatV3) as MatV3, sum(pc.MatV4) as MatV4,sum(pc.MatV5) as MatV5,sum(pc.MatV6) as MatV6, sum(pc.MatV7) as MatV7, sum(pc.MatV8) as MatV8,sum(pc.MatV9) as MatV9,sum(pc.MatV10) as MatV10,sum(pc.MatV11) as MatV11,sum(pc.MatV12) as MatV12, sum(pc.MatV13) as MatV13,sum(pc.MatV14) as MatV14,sum(pc.MatV15) as MatV15,sum(pc.MatV16) as MatV16,sum(pc.MatV17) as MatV17,sum(pc.MatV18) as MatV18, sum(pc.MatV19) as MatV19,sum(pc.MatV20) as MatV20,sum(pc.MatV21) as MatV21,sum(pc.MatV22) as MatV22,sum(pc.MatV23) as MatV23, sum(pc.MatL1) as MatL1,sum(pc.MatL2) as MatL2,sum(pc.MatL3) as MatL3,sum(pc.MatL4) as MatL4,sum(pc.MatL5) as MatL5,sum(pc.MatL6) as MatL6,sum(pc.MatL7) as MatL7, sum(pc.MatL8) as MatL8,sum(pc.MatL9) as MatL9,sum(pc.MatL10) as MatL10,sum(pc.MatL11) as MatL11,sum(pc.MatL12) as MatL12,sum(pc.MatL13) as MatL13, sum(pc.MatL14) as MatL14,sum(pc.MatL15) as MatL15,sum(pc.MatL16) as MatL16,sum(pc.MatL17) as MatL17,sum(pc.MatL18) as MatL18,sum(pc.MatL19) as MatL19, sum(pc.MatL20) as MatL20,sum(pc.MatL21) as MatL21,sum(pc.MatL22) as MatL22,sum(pc.MatL23) as MatL23 from PT_ProduceConsume pc left join PT_TaskPlan tp on pc.TaskId = tp.TaskId and tp.compid=pc.compid left join SM_EPPInfo ei on pc.compid = ei.compid and ei.EPPCode=tp.EPPCode left join SM_BuilderInfo bi on pc.compid = bi.compid and bi.BuilderCode=tp.BuilderCode where pc.compid = #{compid}
and pc.taskId like '%'+#{taskId}+'%'
and pc.StgId like '%'+#{stgId}+'%'
and pc.stirId like '%'+#{stirId}+'%'
and pc.vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and pc.produceTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
group by pc.StirId, ei.EPPName,pc.TaskId,pc.StgId,BuilderName,Placing order by ei.EPPName desc

select pc.StirId,pc.ProduceTime,pc.VehicleID,pc.StgId,pc.TaskId,tp.Placing,pc.PanCode,pc.PanNum as qty, sum(pc.MatV1) as MatV1,sum(pc.MatV2) as MatV2,sum(pc.MatV3) as MatV3, sum(pc.MatV4) as MatV4,sum(pc.MatV5) as MatV5,sum(pc.MatV6) as MatV6, sum(pc.MatV7) as MatV7, sum(pc.MatV8) as MatV8,sum(pc.MatV9) as MatV9,sum(pc.MatV10) as MatV10,sum(pc.MatV11) as MatV11,sum(pc.MatV12) as MatV12, sum(pc.MatV13) as MatV13,sum(pc.MatV14) as MatV14,sum(pc.MatV15) as MatV15,sum(pc.MatV16) as MatV16,sum(pc.MatV17) as MatV17,sum(pc.MatV18) as MatV18, sum(pc.MatV19) as MatV19,sum(pc.MatV20) as MatV20,sum(pc.MatV21) as MatV21,sum(pc.MatV22) as MatV22,sum(pc.MatV23) as MatV23, sum(pc.MatL1) as MatL1,sum(pc.MatL2) as MatL2,sum(pc.MatL3) as MatL3,sum(pc.MatL4) as MatL4,sum(pc.MatL5) as MatL5,sum(pc.MatL6) as MatL6,sum(pc.MatL7) as MatL7, sum(pc.MatL8) as MatL8,sum(pc.MatL9) as MatL9,sum(pc.MatL10) as MatL10,sum(pc.MatL11) as MatL11,sum(pc.MatL12) as MatL12,sum(pc.MatL13) as MatL13, sum(pc.MatL14) as MatL14,sum(pc.MatL15) as MatL15,sum(pc.MatL16) as MatL16,sum(pc.MatL17) as MatL17,sum(pc.MatL18) as MatL18,sum(pc.MatL19) as MatL19, sum(pc.MatL20) as MatL20,sum(pc.MatL21) as MatL21,sum(pc.MatL22) as MatL22,sum(pc.MatL23) as MatL23 from dbo.PT_ProduceConsume pc left join PT_TaskPlan tp on pc.TaskId = tp.TaskId and tp.compid=pc.compid where pc.compid = #{compid}
and pc.taskId like '%'+#{taskId}+'%'
and pc.stirId like '%'+#{stirId}+'%'
and pc.StgId like '%'+#{stgId}+'%'
and pc.vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and pc.produceTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
group by pc.PanNum,pc.StirId,pc.ProduceTime,pc.VehicleID,pc.StgId,pc.TaskId,tp.Placing,pc.PanCode order by pc.ProduceTime desc

select top ${pageSize} * from (select row_number() over(order by ProduceTime desc) as rownumber, pc.StirId,pc.ProduceTime,pc.VehicleID,pc.StgId,pc.TaskId,tp.Placing,pc.PanCode,pc.PanNum as qty, sum(pc.MatV1) as MatV1,sum(pc.MatV2) as MatV2,sum(pc.MatV3) as MatV3, sum(pc.MatV4) as MatV4,sum(pc.MatV5) as MatV5,sum(pc.MatV6) as MatV6, sum(pc.MatV7) as MatV7, sum(pc.MatV8) as MatV8,sum(pc.MatV9) as MatV9,sum(pc.MatV10) as MatV10, sum(pc.MatV11) as MatV11,sum(pc.MatV12) as MatV12,sum(pc.MatV13) as MatV13,sum(pc.MatV14) as MatV14, sum(pc.MatV15) as MatV15,sum(pc.MatV16) as MatV16,sum(pc.MatV17) as MatV17,sum(pc.MatV18) as MatV18, sum(pc.MatV19) as MatV19,sum(pc.MatV20) as MatV20,sum(pc.MatV21) as MatV21,sum(pc.MatV22) as MatV22, sum(pc.MatV23) as MatV23,sum(pc.MatL1) as MatL1,sum(pc.MatL2) as MatL2,sum(pc.MatL3) as MatL3, sum(pc.MatL4) as MatL4,sum(pc.MatL5) as MatL5,sum(pc.MatL6) as MatL6,sum(pc.MatL7) as MatL7, sum(pc.MatL8) as MatL8,sum(pc.MatL9) as MatL9,sum(pc.MatL10) as MatL10,sum(pc.MatL11) as MatL11, sum(pc.MatL12) as MatL12,sum(pc.MatL13) as MatL13,sum(pc.MatL14) as MatL14,sum(pc.MatL15) as MatL15, sum(pc.MatL16) as MatL16,sum(pc.MatL17) as MatL17,sum(pc.MatL18) as MatL18,sum(pc.MatL19) as MatL19, sum(pc.MatL20) as MatL20,sum(pc.MatL21) as MatL21,sum(pc.MatL22) as MatL22,sum(pc.MatL23) as MatL23 from dbo.PT_ProduceConsume pc left join PT_TaskPlan tp on pc.TaskId = tp.TaskId and tp.compid=pc.compid where pc.compid = #{compid} and ( isnull(ABS(MatV1-MatL1)/nullif(MatV1,0),0)>0.02 or isnull(ABS(MatV2-MatL2)/nullif(MatV2,0),0)>0.02 or isnull(ABS(MatV3-MatL3)/nullif(MatV3,0),0)>0.02 or isnull(ABS(MatV4-MatL4)/nullif(MatV4,0),0)>0.02 or isnull(ABS(MatV5-MatL5)/nullif(MatV5,0),0)>0.02 or isnull(ABS(MatV6-MatL6)/nullif(MatV6,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV7-MatL7)/nullif(MatV7,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV8-MatL8)/nullif(MatV8,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV9-MatL9)/nullif(MatV9,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV10-MatL10)/nullif(MatV10,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV11-MatL11)/nullif(MatV11,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV12-MatL12)/nullif(MatV12,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV13-MatL13)/nullif(MatV13,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV14-MatL14)/nullif(MatV14,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV15-MatL15)/nullif(MatV15,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV16-MatL16)/nullif(MatV16,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV17-MatL17)/nullif(MatV17,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV18-MatL18)/nullif(MatV18,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV19-MatL19)/nullif(MatV19,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV20-MatL20)/nullif(MatV20,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV21-MatL21)/nullif(MatV21,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV22-MatL22)/nullif(MatV22,0),0)>0.01 or isnull(ABS(MatV23-MatL23)/nullif(MatV23,0),0)>0.01 )
and pc.taskId like '%'+#{taskId}+'%'
and pc.stirId like '%'+#{stirId}+'%'
and pc.StgId like '%'+#{stgId}+'%'
and pc.vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and pc.produceTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
group by pc.PanNum,pc.StirId,pc.ProduceTime,pc.VehicleID,pc.StgId,pc.TaskId,tp.Placing,pc.PanCode ) temp_row where rownumber>((#{page}-1)*#{pageSize});

select pc.StirId,pt.StgId,sum(pc.PanNum) as qty, sum(pc.MatV1)as MatV1,sum(pc.MatV2) as MatV2,sum(pc.MatV3) as MatV3, sum(pc.MatV4) as MatV4,sum(pc.MatV5) as MatV5,sum(pc.MatV6) as MatV6, sum(pc.MatV7) as MatV7, sum(pc.MatV8) as MatV8,sum(pc.MatV9) as MatV9,sum(pc.MatV10) as MatV10,sum(pc.MatV11) as MatV11,sum(pc.MatV12) as MatV12, sum(pc.MatV13) as MatV13,sum(pc.MatV14) as MatV14,sum(pc.MatV15) as MatV15,sum(pc.MatV16) as MatV16,sum(pc.MatV17) as MatV17,sum(pc.MatV18) as MatV18, sum(pc.MatV19) as MatV19,sum(pc.MatV20) as MatV20,sum(pc.MatV21) as MatV21,sum(pc.MatV22) as MatV22,sum(pc.MatV23) as MatV23, sum(pc.MatL1) as MatL1,sum(pc.MatL2) as MatL2,sum(pc.MatL3) as MatL3,sum(pc.MatL4) as MatL4,sum(pc.MatL5) as MatL5,sum(pc.MatL6) as MatL6,sum(pc.MatL7) as MatL7, sum(pc.MatL8) as MatL8,sum(pc.MatL9) as MatL9,sum(pc.MatL10) as MatL10,sum(pc.MatL11) as MatL11,sum(pc.MatL12) as MatL12,sum(pc.MatL13) as MatL13, sum(pc.MatL14) as MatL14,sum(pc.MatL15) as MatL15,sum(pc.MatL16) as MatL16,sum(pc.MatL17) as MatL17,sum(pc.MatL18) as MatL18,sum(pc.MatL19) as MatL19, sum(pc.MatL20) as MatL20,sum(pc.MatL21) as MatL21,sum(pc.MatL22) as MatL22,sum(pc.MatL23) as MatL23 from PT_ProduceConsume pc left join PT_TaskPlan pt on pc.compid =pt.compid and pc.TaskId =pt.TaskId where pc.compid = #{compid} and pc.RecStatus =1 and pt.RecStatus =1
and pc.taskId like '%'+#{taskId}+'%'
and pc.stirId like '%'+#{stirId}+'%'
and pc.StgId like '%'+#{stgId}+'%'
and pc.vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and pc.produceTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
group by pc.StirId,pt.StgId order by pc.StirId,pt.StgId

select pt.StgId as stgId,sum(pc.PanNum) as num from PT_ProduceConsume pc left join PT_TaskPlan pt on pc.compid =pt.compid and pc.TaskId =pt.TaskId where pc.compid = #{compid} and pc.RecStatus =1 and pt.RecStatus =1
and pc.taskId like '%'+#{taskId}+'%'
and pc.stirId like '%'+#{stirId}+'%'
and pc.StgId like '%'+#{stgId}+'%'
and pc.vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and pc.produceTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
group by pt.StgId order by pt.StgId

select pc.StirId,sum(pc.PanNum) as qty,sum(pc.MatV1) as MatV1,sum(pc.MatV2) as MatV2,sum(pc.MatV3) as MatV3, sum(pc.MatV4) as MatV4,sum(pc.MatV5) as MatV5,sum(pc.MatV6) as MatV6, sum(pc.MatV7) as MatV7, sum(pc.MatV8) as MatV8,sum(pc.MatV9) as MatV9,sum(pc.MatV10) as MatV10,sum(pc.MatV11) as MatV11,sum(pc.MatV12) as MatV12, sum(pc.MatV13) as MatV13,sum(pc.MatV14) as MatV14,sum(pc.MatV15) as MatV15,sum(pc.MatV16) as MatV16,sum(pc.MatV17) as MatV17,sum(pc.MatV18) as MatV18, sum(pc.MatV19) as MatV19,sum(pc.MatV20) as MatV20,sum(pc.MatV21) as MatV21,sum(pc.MatV22) as MatV22,sum(pc.MatV23) as MatV23, sum(pc.MatL1) as MatL1,sum(pc.MatL2) as MatL2,sum(pc.MatL3) as MatL3,sum(pc.MatL4) as MatL4,sum(pc.MatL5) as MatL5,sum(pc.MatL6) as MatL6,sum(pc.MatL7) as MatL7, sum(pc.MatL8) as MatL8,sum(pc.MatL9) as MatL9,sum(pc.MatL10) as MatL10,sum(pc.MatL11) as MatL11,sum(pc.MatL12) as MatL12,sum(pc.MatL13) as MatL13, sum(pc.MatL14) as MatL14,sum(pc.MatL15) as MatL15,sum(pc.MatL16) as MatL16,sum(pc.MatL17) as MatL17,sum(pc.MatL18) as MatL18,sum(pc.MatL19) as MatL19, sum(pc.MatL20) as MatL20,sum(pc.MatL21) as MatL21,sum(pc.MatL22) as MatL22,sum(pc.MatL23) as MatL23 from PT_ProduceConsume pc where pc.compid = #{compid}
and pc.taskId like '%'+#{taskId}+'%'
and pc.stirId like '%'+#{stirId}+'%'
and pc.StgId like '%'+#{stgId}+'%'
and pc.VehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and pc.produceTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
group by pc.StirId order by pc.StirId

select sum(pc.PanNum) as totalNum from PT_ProduceConsume pc left join PT_TaskPlan pt on pc.compid =pt.compid and pc.TaskId =pt.TaskId where pc.compid = #{compid} and pc.RecStatus =1 and pt.RecStatus =1
and pc.taskId like '%'+#{taskId}+'%'
and pc.stirId like '%'+#{stirId}+'%'
and pc.StgId like '%'+#{stgId}+'%'
and pc.vehicleId like '%'+#{vehicleId}+'%'
and pc.produceTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}

select * from PT_ProduceConsume where compid=#{compid}
and produceTime between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
